laboratory_examinations.findings: Total WBC count of 63% neutrophils, 24% lymphocytes, and 11% monocytes; normal hematocrit and platelet count.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased in the context of multiorgan dysfunction.

laboratory_examinations.findings: LF detectable in plasma samples at 294.30 ng/mL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 16.0 ng/mL by 23 February and further decreased to 0.85 ng/mL 1 hour after completion of AIG on 23 February.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Anti-PA IgG was quantifiable at 9.0 mg/mL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased to 17.9 mg/mL by 23 February and reached a maximum of 311.4 mg/mL on 28 February.

laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC count of 110 cells/mL (25% neutrophils, 24% lymphocytes, and 51% monocytes); no organisms on Gram staining; bacterial culture sterile.
